description:
Hearing this from Nils, the normally mild Sei is enraged. Nils’s Gunpla may be superb, but Sei finds it absolutely unacceptable for him to make a mockery of Gunpla Battle. With neither side willing to concede their desires, they begin their battle, and the hidden mysteries of Nils’s Sengoku Astray are finally revealed!
Source: crunchyroll
